title: I report anyone who plays Sona, Jax or Galio in URF

replies.body: Am I cancer? I use Yasuo on URF :^)

> [{quoted}](name=MageBlades,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9wOViUg3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-12T08:23:53.770+0000)
>
> Am I cancer? I use Yasuo on URF :^)

Is that even viable? I mean his CDs on base are low.
He's really bad compared to other champion potentials since 3 of his 5 abilities (including passive) can't scale with the huge CDR benefit from URF's Insanely Lame Buff of Lame Buffing or something

> [{quoted}](name=Crackdogrock,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9wOViUg3,comment-id=0000000000000001,timestamp=2015-04-13T02:32:04.283+0000)
>
> well his q scales off atk speed. So it doesn't benefit off cdr at all?

Basically

Same with his E, which doesn't scale off anything in terms of CD

> [{quoted}](name=MageBlades,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9wOViUg3,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-12T08:37:18.915+0000)
>
> He's really bad compared to other champion potentials since 3 of his 5 abilities (including passive) can't scale with the huge CDR benefit from URF's Insanely Lame Buff of Lame Buffing or something

I really wanna play him tbh, his ult must be on like a 12s cooldown, FIora is also broken af in URF, that ult though on a 20s cooldown, 17s by the time it ends.

Sackboy

you always seem to amaze me xd

> [{quoted}](name=Cakemeisting,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9wOViUg3,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-12T09:25:16.221+0000)
>
> Galio eats Orianna for breakfast.

Yes, which is why he must be banned.

You wanna get your fingers tied up? Play Jayce on URF. You wanna have trouble positioning yourself while doing so? Play Orianna on URF.

Both way too fun. I recommend on Co-Op though so you don't get rekt and you don't verse cancer like Ezreal/Riven/whatever-other-mofo-picks-just-to-win

> [{quoted}](name=MageBlades,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9wOViUg3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-12T08:53:15.682+0000)
>
> You wanna get your fingers tied up? Play Jayce on URF. You wanna have trouble positioning yourself while doing so? Play Orianna on URF.
> 
> Both way too fun. I recommend on Co-Op though so you don't get rekt and you don't verse cancer like Ezreal/Riven/whatever-other-mofo-picks-just-to-win

My W/L ratio with Orianna in URF is 74/3. She's freelo.
